From: Motor Dubai 
Sent: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 9:31 AM
To: Geraldine.Dote@etoilegroup.com
Cc: Diana Haydar <Diana.Haydar@nascodubai.com>; Direct Sales Dubai <DirectSales@nascodubai.com>
Subject: Motor Renewal Quotation || Policy - 82-MVA-2024-00242 || Insured Name - INGIE CHEHADE CHALHOUB

 

Dear INGIE CHEHADE CHALHOUB, 

We are pleased to attach herewith the motor renewal quote for your vehicle.

In order to proceed, please advise & provide the following. 

*	Emirates Id copy
*	Driving License copy
*	Start date required - date that the registration would be done - the policy will start from this date for 13 months as required by RTA
*	Existing Registration Card Copy
*	Online payment link will be sent across on confirmation of the above


We are pleased to announce that our car rental benefit has undergone significant enhancements to better serve the needs of our customers.

We are pleased to announce that our car rental benefit has undergone significant enhancements to better serve the needs of our customers.

These improvements include an expanded selection of vehicles, allowing you to choose the option that best aligns with your preferences and requirements.

Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
